title: Congrats for finishing all the quests!!
description: Here's a trophy for your efforts!

dialogue.text: Look who's back already!! My favorite human! You're a human, right? I'm pretty sure you are. Anyway, I'd love to present this prestigious award to you!

Well, adventurer, because you've completed the first wave of quests!! There are certainly many more on the horizon, but you've reached a significant milestone. And for that, this Completionist Award is all yours!!
You betcha! You've earned it. I'll see you around, friend!
